text: Leonard Harry Cleaver (27 October 1909 – 7 July 1993) was a British Conservative politician. He was elected as Member of Parliament (MP) for the Birmingham Yardley constituency at the 1959 general election, winning the marginal seat from Labour. Cleaver served until the 1964 general election, when the seat was won by Labour candidate Ioan Evans. == References == * == External links == * Category:1909 births Category:1993 deaths Category:Conservative Party (UK) MPs for English constituencies Category:UK MPs 1959–1964
title: Leonard Cleaver
